posts.post_title: FS: Lot of (13) S74 White Silks Turkey Red Backs (12) and Old Mill Back (1)
posts.post_content:
[QUOTE][/QUOTE]Hello! Recently won this lot at auction for the Pelty silk....would prefer to sell the rest as a lot but would break apart if that doesn't work out....asking $1975 for all 13....please ask any questions....would do cash/trade for any rare Barney Pelty or Hank Greenberg I may need....Thanks....Michael.

Includes Turkey Red 
1 Charles Gabby Street Washington Senators
2 Jack Quinn N Y Yankees 
3 Lee Tannehill Chicago Whitesox 
4 Rebel Revel Oakes St Louis Cardinals 
5 Freddy Parent Chicago Whitesox 
6 Freddy Parent Chicago Whitesox  different color
7 Fred Merckle N Y Giants 
8 David Davy Jones Detroit Tigers 
9 John Flynn Pittsburgh Pirates 
10 Ed Willett Detroit Tigers 
11 Arnold Hauser St Louis Cardinals 
12 Charles Phillippe Pittsburgh Pirates 

Old Mill
John T Chief Meyers N Y Giants 

Barney Pelty NOT INCLUDED in this lot

Thanks....Michael
